NodeMap.Site: Our favorite links to all the tutorials, tools and other generally cool PureMVC related stuff we've found on the web.
What's going on in the PureMVC Blog-O-Sphere? Google Blog Search makes it easy to keep a pulse on the PureMVC community with the most relevant and recent PureMVC-related posts.

LinkedIn is an interconnected network of experienced professionals from around the world. Join the PureMVC Developers Group on Linked In and connect with a community of talented professionals who use PureMVC.

The PureMVC Architect's Lounge is a the heart of the PureMVC community. A knowledgable community, all helping to push forward the best practices with rich discussions about real-world issues in RIA development with PureMVC.

Site.name: PureMVC Job Postings Around the Web

NodeMap.Site: Simply Hired provides PureMVC with a Jobs board with filters you control. If you're in the market for a PureMVC job, this is the quickest way to find what you're looking for. Recruiters, post a PureMVC related job for just 5$ for 15 days. This is the most targeted way to reach knowledgable PureMVC developers!
Help educate the world about the PureMVC framework as part of the largest free, communal body of knowledge ever created!
Yes, there is a PureMVC Facebook page! Duh.
Technorati rates blogs by authority and is another great way to keep an eye on what bloggers are saying about PureMVC.

Occasionally.
